basic.description: On October 2nd-3rd, 2015, the faculty will host an international conference on "Constitutional Culture", with speakers from Queen's, Tel Aviv University in Israel, and top American law schools. The conference will address selected emerging issues in constitutional doctrine, theory, and scholarship, in Canada, Israel, the United States, and potentially other systems. This intensive course will allow students to attend this conference for credit, and give them the rare opportunity to hear or read original papers written by the world's top constitutional thinkers, as well as discussion about these papers.
basic.subject: LAW
basic.title: Advanced Constitutional Law - Comparative Perspectives
